description: He won critical acclaim for his performance in The Danish Girl. But Eddie Redmayne has confirmed he's gearing up for the absolute role of a lifetime - specifically, first-time fatherhood.
title: Golden Globe winner Eddie Redmayne confirms wife Hannah Bagshawe is pregnant
title_page: Golden Globe winner Eddie Redmayne confirms wife Hannah Bagshawe is pregnant | Daily Mail Online
text:
He may have won critical acclaim for his performance in The Danish Girl.
But British actor Eddie Redmayne has confirmed that he's gearing up for the role of a lifetime - namely, fatherhood.
The award-winning star used the 73rd annual Golden Globes to share the news, which delighted both film fans and critics alike.
Scroll down for video
Expecting: Eddie Redmayne used the 73rd Golden Globes to confirm that wife Hannah Bagshaw is pregnant
Speaking to veteran TV host Ryan Seacrest at the Hilton Hotel in Beverly Hills - who asked whether they were expecting - Eddie replied: 'That is true.'
The couple, who married in 2014, were then presented with baby shower gifts which included onesies saying 'You Should See My Crib' and 'Milking My 15 Minutes'.
Laughing, Eddie responded: 'I’m sweating now – she’s calm I’m not.'
See our full Golden Globes coverage on the winners and red carpet fashion
Oh dear: He was up for Best Performance By An Actor In A Motion Picture Drama - and it's fair to say that Eddie Redmayne had let his nerves get the better of him
He told Ryan Seacrest: 'I’m sweating now – she’s calm I’m not' of his wife
The arrival, which is thought to be expected in late Spring, will be the couples' first child together.
Clearly feeling protective of his wife, Eddie could then be seen guiding her across the busy red carpet.
'It's a bit like Waterloo Station at rush hour', he quipped as security guards tried to clear the celebrity gridlock on the long and winding red carpet.
The good news will surely eclipse the fact he missed out on a gong for his performance in The Danish Girl. He was up against Leonardo DiCaprio, who eventually won for The Revenant.
Happy times: Ryan also asked Eddie: You have a baby on the way?' To which Eddie said: 'That is true'
Gift: The television host and producer then gave them onesies that said - 'You should see my crib' emblazoned across the front
The Danish Girl is a fictitious love story loosely inspired by the lives of Danish artists Lili Elbe and Gerda Wegener. In it, Lili (Eddie) and Gerda's (Alicia Vikander) marriage and work evolve as they navigate Lili's groundbreaking journey as a transgender pioneer.
That aside, Eddie looked incredibly dapper in a navy suit which had delicate polka dots running throughout, as well as a bow tie and white shirt.
Hannah looked amazing in a complementary black dress which hid any sign of a bump thanks to its layered ruffled design.
Last minute dash: Earlier on in the day, Eddie was pictured arriving at LAX airport a matter of hours before the show was set to start
On the move: The star wore a casual eagle sweater and thick-framed glasses as he carried his briefcase through the terminal
She wore a pretty green beaded necklace as he cosied up to her man while they posed for photographers.
Earlier on in the day, Eddie was pictured arriving at LAX airport a matter of hours before the show was set to start.
The star wore a casual eagle sweater and thick-framed glasses as he carried his briefcase through the terminal.
